messages.message:
Cross-posting for visibility. Proposed a dev/non-production ECR cleanup next Tuesday, May 27
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C08BQ5EN6D7/p1747921858081159 (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C08BQ5EN6D7/p1747921858081159)
is there a way to backup these images in cold storage or somewhere ?

in theory, possibly? but looking at the report of proposed images to delete, an overwhelming percentage are untagged images, which indicate a cache buildup. Purging the cache is little to no risk and we should ensure mechanisms are in place to do this regularly going forward.
and then the majority of the rest are images built for sandboxes long gone. And if somehow theres something that falls through the gap, we can always fix forward and rebuild images
Yea, I think it's a good consideration to make - but anything that's in instabase-dev that just _can't_ be lost is in the wrong account. :sweat_smile:
